RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT CUSTOMER_NO ,GFCID,SHORT_NAME,CUSTOMER_NAME1 FROM OLTMS_CUSTOMER M WHERE RECORD_STAT='O' AND AUTH_STAT='A'
SELECT ccy FROM LBTBS_FACILITY_CCY WHERE contract_ref_no = ?

SELECT SSI_MNEMONIC, SETTLEMENT_SEQ_NO, BRANCH, PAY_ACCOUNT, RECV_ACCOUNT, COUNTERPARTY, CURRENCY FROM OLTMS_INSTR WHERE COUNTERPARTY IN ('ALL', ?) AND CURRENCY = ? AND DECODE(PRODUCT_CODE, 'ALL', ?, PRODUCT_CODE) = ? AND RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND BRANCH in (GLOBAL.current_branch,'ALL')

RAD_DATASOURCES.RELATION_WITH_PARENT: LBTBS_ORIG_SSI_MAINT_DETAIL.CONTRACT_REF_NO = LBTBS_ORIG_SSI_MAINT_MASTER.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND LBTBS_ORIG_SSI_MAINT_DETAIL.VERSION_NO = LBTBS_ORIG_SSI_MAINT_MASTER.VERSION_NO AND LBTBS_ORIG_SSI_MAINT_DETAIL.CUSTOMER_NO = LBTBS_ORIG_SSI_MAINT_MASTER.CUSTOMER_NO
